verses.verse: O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, in you do I put my trust <S%H2620><s%>: save <S%H3467><s%> me from all them that persecute <S%H7291><s%> me <S%H5337><s%>, and deliver me:
Lest he tear <S%H2963><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> like a lion <S%H738><s%>, rending it in pieces <S%H6561><s%>, while there is none to deliver <S%H5337><s%>.
O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, if I have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H3426><s%>; if there be iniquity <S%H5766><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%>;

If I have rewarded <S%H1580><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> unto him that was at peace <S%H7999><s%> with me <S%H2502><s%>; (Yes, I have delivered him that without cause <S%H7387><s%> is my enemy <S%H6887><s%>:)

Let the enemy <S%H341><s%> persecute <S%H7291><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and take <S%H5381><s%> it <S%H7429><s%>; Yes, let him tread down my life <S%H2416><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, and lay <S%H7931><s%> my honor <S%H3519><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, in your anger <S%H639><s%>, lift up <S%H5375><s%> yourself because of the rage <S%H5678><s%> of my enemies <S%H6887><s%>: and awake <S%H5782><s%> for me to the judgment <S%H4941><s%> that you have commanded <S%H6680><s%>.
So shall the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the people <S%H3816><s%> compass you about <S%H5437><s%>: for their sakes therefore return <S%H7725><s%> you on high <S%H4791><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall judge <S%H1777><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>: judge <S%H8199><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Lord, according to my righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and according to my integrity that is in me <S%H8537><s%>.

Oh let the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> come to an end <S%H1584><s%>; but establish <S%H3559><s%> the just <S%H6662><s%>: for the righteous <S%H6662><s%> God <S%H430><s%> tries <S%H974><s%> the hearts <S%H3826><s%> and minds <S%H3629><s%>.
My defense <S%H4043><s%> is of God <S%H430><s%>, which saves <S%H3467><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> judges <S%H8199><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%>, and God <S%H410><s%> is angry <S%H2194><s%> with the wicked every day <S%H3117><s%>.
If he turn <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3913><s%>, he will sharpen his sword <S%H2719><s%>; he has bent <S%H1869><s%> his bow <S%H7198><s%>, and made it ready <S%H3559><s%>.
He has also prepared <S%H3559><s%> for him the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>; he ordains <S%H6466><s%> his arrows <S%H2671><s%> against the persecutors <S%H1814><s%>.
Behold <S%H2254><s%>, he travails with iniquity <S%H205><s%>, and has conceived <S%H2029><s%> mischief <S%H5999><s%>, and brought forth <S%H3205><s%> falsehood <S%H8267><s%>.
He made <S%H3738><s%> a pit <S%H953><s%>, and dug <S%H2658><s%> it <S%H5307><s%>, and is fallen into the ditch <S%H7845><s%> which he made <S%H6466><s%>.
His mischief <S%H5999><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>, and his violent <S%H2555><s%> dealing shall come down <S%H3381><s%> upon his own head <S%H6936><s%>.

I will praise <S%H3034><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> according to his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: and will sing praise <S%H2167><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> most high <S%H5945><s%>.
